interface.name: EAP_DisplaySourceIntegrationCallbackFailure
interface.description: Interface to show the Source Integration error for maker
interface.definition: a!localVariables( local!failedSourceIntegrationFiles: index( ri!sourceIntegrationResponse, wherecontains( "failed", index(ri!sourceIntegrationResponse,"tranStatus",null) ), null ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_boxLayout"( style: "ERROR", label: "Source Integration Error for Request Id: " & ri!requestDetails.requestId, contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: local!failedSourceIntegrationFiles, expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"( value: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextHeader"( text : fv!index ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: "Error in Parsing File : ", color: "NEGATIVE", style:"STRONG" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: #"_a-0000e4dd-0d8b-8000-5257-1bef901bef90_222157"(fv!item.configId), color: "NEGATIVE", style: "EMPHASIS" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: "Error Code", color: "NEGATIVE", style:"STRONG" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: fv!item.errorCode, color: "NEGATIVE", style: "EMPHASIS" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: "Error Message", color: "NEGATIVE", style:"STRONG" ), char(10), char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"( text: fv!item.errorMessage, color: "NEGATIVE", style: "EMPHASIS" ) } ) ) } ), }, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"( label: "Close", style: "PRIMARY", submit: true(), saveInto: { a!save( ri!requestDetails.requestCurrStatus, "REQ_CLS" ), a!save( ri!requestDetails.updatedBy, loggedInUser() ), a!save( ri!requestDetails.updatedOn, now() ) } ) ) ) )
